# iiptreviewer

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of iiptreviewer is to make the underlying data as accessible as possible to reproduce the analyses or use them for one's own research.

## Installation

You can install the released version of iiptreviewer from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("benediktclaus/iiptreviewer")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(iiptreviewer)

iipt_dataset
```
